Text: Why surprised? Dawkins is an exceptional scientist, and no scientist would claim 100% knowledge of anything which is basically unfalsifiable. It's all about assessing the evidence-and there is none for a theistic god. Thanks for the up, looking forward to this :))

Fair point bonzofan.

Enjoy the debate!!
I'm as atheist as anybody BUT I cant say Im 100% sure of it, only religious fanatics do, but they are lying. Leaving a little crack of doubt is the correct scientific attitude.

Perhaps there is a god.  However, he would be more sophisticated that that nonsense you find in the bible.  Something truly beyond all human comprehension.

I think that nobody could state that there is no God.  All you can be certain of is that Jesus was a deranged lunatic who ran round Palestine bragging that he was the son of god and the bible god is pure fantasy!
